Posts.Content: i have been having pain around my rib cage, similar to but not as bad as the pain i had on dose dense a/c with neulasta. i am now on weekly taxol and herceptin. i had mostly rib, back and sternum pain previously. would the taxol or herceptin be causing the rib cage soreness/pain? didn't really expect this. any thoughts leo? sassy
